remarks: Value of the named cosh function.  Here we show the simple conversion to the conventional form used in set.mm, using the definition given by ~ df-cosh .  See ~ coshval for a theorem to convert this further. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 10-May-2015.)
statement: coshval-named $p |- ( A e. CC -> ( cosh ` A ) = ( cos ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) $.
